Regression {3}{R} [i](If you cast this for its regression cost, it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of your next upkeep and create a 1/1 copy of it with haste.)[/i]
Whenever a creature dies, you may exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard and copy it. You may cast the copy. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
